City Council

  • 2nd and 4th Thursdays of each month
  • Stanwood-Camano School District Administration Building 26920 Pioneer Highway, Stanwood
  • Stanwood-Camano School District Administration Building 26920 Pioneer Highway, Stanwood

Darren Robb, Sid Roberts, Robert Hicks, Steve Shepro, Andreena Bergman, Jeff Wheatley, Dani Gaumond, Earl Cowan

All regular and special meetings of the Stanwood City Council are open to the public, except as provided for in Revised Code of Washington (RCW) 42.30 . Council meetings are run in accordance with Council’s Rules of Procedure .

Anyone wishing to provide a written comment must submit it by 12:00 p.m. the day of the meeting by clicking this link or by email city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us

Anyone wishing to provide a verbal comment may do so by attending the city council meeting in person.

City of Stanwood council meetings can receive remote (online or phone-in) public comments by reasonable accommodation only.  Any requests for reasonable accommodations for remote participation, must be sent in writing to the City Clerk at city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us no later than 12:00 p.m. on the day of the meeting.

Anyone wishing to provide a written testimony for a public hearing must submit it by 12:00 p.m. the day of the meeting by calling (360) 454-5213 or by clicking this link

City of Stanwood public hearings can receive remote (online or phone-in) testimony by reasonable accommodation only.  Any requests for reasonable accommodations for remote participation, must be sent in writing to the City Clerk at city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us no later than 12:00 p.m. on the day of the meeting.
